name: The 3rd Int'l Conference on Sport Science and Physical Education
content:
[The 3rd Int'l Conference on Sport Science and Physical Education (SSPE 2019)](http://www.engii.org/conference/SSPE2019/) 
 
 Conference Date: March 23-25, 2019 
 Conference Venue: Xi'an, China 
 Website: http://www.engii.org/conference/SSPE2019/ 
 Online Registration: http://www.engii.org/RegistrationSubmission/default.aspx?ConferenceID=1092 

**Publication and Presentation** 
 All the accepted papers will be published by "Open Journal of Social Sciences", a peer-reviewed open access journal which will be submitted to CNKI and Google scholar. 
 You can submit your papers/abstract through [Registration System](http://www.engii.org/RegistrationSubmission/default.aspx?ConferenceID=1092) or send to edu\_sep@engii.org. 

**Call for Speakers** 
 If you wish to serve the conference as an Invited Speaker, please send email to us with your CV for evaluation. 

**Contact Us** 
 Contact Person: Ms. Rolin 
 Email: edu\_sep@engii.org 
 Tel: +86 15527426990 
 QQ: 3025797047 
 WeChat: Engii\_vivian 

**Conference Topics** 

The conference is soliciting state-of-the-art research papers in the following areas of interest: 
 
 Reform and Innovation 
 Sport Sociology 
 Sport Psychology/Physiology 
 Sports Biomechanics 
 Sports Coaching and Training 
 Sports Engineering 
 Sports Equipment and Technology 
 Sports Medicine/Traumatology/Health 
 Sports Nutrition/Foods 
 Sports Industry/Economics 
 Mass Sports 
 School Sports 
 University Sports 
 Curriculum Design / Pedagogy of Physical Education 
 Adapted Physical Activity 
 Measurement and Evaluation 
 Sports Statistics 
 Sports Ergonomics 
 Sports Organization and Management 
 Sports Globalization 
 Regulations and Policies 
 Other Related Topics
